title: Unable to connect to the login queue?
body:
Never had this before, I can not login whole day. EUNE server?

''Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status here, if it looks good follow the guide here''.

What to do, anyone? How to fix this? HELP??? :)

replies.body:
+1
It started around June 20th

Or ''Unable to connect to the login queue''.
But if i use VPN (germany or poland) i can enter w/o problems.

Or i play with HUGE LAGS... but ping is 40-50
Cant even start game... Press Find match and wait 5-6 sec for start timer.
Play with wired connection 4 years.

If you still haven't been able to get signed in, there might be something blocking your connection from being able to reach our servers. Check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is still in order there and let me know if it helps.

Hello, 

I try and I already download The Hextech Repair Tool, follow that rules and nothing. Still same, whole day working on it, 2 times reinstall LoL, "x" times restart PC for some things and still don't know what to do with LoL, so sad... 
Please help me, i already crazy. :)
Same problem on NA server.  I'm on the same network and PC I've used to play in the past, had this problem since the last patch.
Same, today in morning was ok, but than BOOM. Try all but still no. And yeah btw, server is still online, mindfck...
